TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UploadDataCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks Instances of this class are passed to the <xref:System.Net.UploadDataCompletedEventHandler>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading data.
[!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.net.uploaddatac_1_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.net.uploaddatac_1_1.cs)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#34](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.net.uploaddatac_1_1.vb)]
The following method is called when the upload completes.
[!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.net.uploaddatac_1_2.cpp)] [!code-cs[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.net.uploaddatac_1_2.cs)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.net.uploaddatac_1_2.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the server reply to a data upload operation started by calling an <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync%2A> method.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Byte> array containing the server reply.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You should check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> properties before using the data returned by this property. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property's value is an <xref:System.Exception> object or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the Result property's value will not be valid.
## Examples The following code example displays the value of this property.
[!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/add/codesnippet/CPP/p-system.net.uploaddatac_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/p-system.net.uploaddatac_1.cs)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#35](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/p-system.net.uploaddatac_1.vb)]
